column1: Has ever had a problem with bed bugs in these hotels?Milan-Hotel Casa MiaVenice-Istituto San Giuseppe -monasteryFlorence-Leonardo House - hostelStressa- Du Parc Hotel
Why would you expect bed bugs?

I have heard that there is an epidemic of bed bugs in hotels and that if they are carried home in your suitcases, they can infest your home. I know two people who brought bed bugs home with them. It was a nightmare to get rid of them.

Oh dear. "I have heard" almost always seems to lead up to some extraordinary piece of misinformation. There is no epidemic of bed bugs. I have been following the Italian forums since 2007, and there has not been one first-hand report of bed bugs.

Bed bugs get a lot of press in the US in all levels of hotels. Here is one site dedicated to reports.http://bedbugregistry.com/ I spend 3 to 5 months a year in Italy and have not run into them yet. My only experience of them was in Nepal. There was one hotel review of a hotel in Florence that convinced me to look elsewhere.TABEdited: 8 years ago
